comment: Russia , Syria , and Iran are killing , or on their way to killing , thousands of innocent civilians in Idlib Province . Don t do it ! Turkey is working hard to stop this carnage .
amr:
# ::snt Russia , Syria , and Iran are killing , or on their way to killing , thousands of innocent civilians in Idlib Province . Don t do it ! Turkey is working hard to stop this carnage .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / or
            :op1 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (c / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Russia"))
                        :op2 (c2 / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Syria"))
                        :op3 (c3 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Iran")))
                  :ARG1 (c4 / civilian
                        :quant (m2 / multiple
                              :op1 1000)
                        :ARG1-of (ii / innocent-01))
                  :location (p / province
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Id Idlib")))
            :op2 (g / go-05
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 k
                  :ARG2 (k2 / kill-01
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 c4)))
      :snt2 (d / do-02
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii2 / it))
      :snt3 (w / work-01
            :ARG0 (c5 / country
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Turkey"))
            :ARG1 (s / stop-01
                  :ARG0 c5
                  :ARG1 (c6 / carnage
                        :mod (t / this)))
            :ARG1-of (h / hard-02)))

comment: Don't know what poll your using but this one says % say DON'T impeach , % say do . Remember now that polls are taken to influence voters not to record them .
